file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: /v1
info:
  description: MRA Uploader API
  version: "1.0.0-oas3"
  title: MRA Uploader API
  contact:
    name: Aidan Carson
    email: aidan.carson@nginx.com
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
paths:
  /:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Hello World!
  /image:
    post:
      tags:
        - image
      summary: Upload Image
      description: Calls resizer and album manager to upload image and add it to album
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Image'
        '500':
          description: image not uploaded
      x-tags:
        - tag: image
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/x-www-form-urlencoded:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                note:
                  description: Image data
                  type: string
        required: true
  '/image/uploads/photos/{uuid}':
    delete:
      tags:
        - image
      summary: Delete single image based off id
      parameters:
        - name: uuid
          in: path
          description: The id of image to be deleted within S3 bucket
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
        '500':
          description: image unsuccessfully deleted
components:
  schemas:
    Image:
      type: object
      properties:
        thumb_url:
          type: string
        Large_width:
          type: string
        Medium_height:
          type: string
        Medium_width:
          type: string
        Thumb_width:
          type: string
        Thumb_height:
          type: string
        medium_url:
          type: string
        large_url:
          type: string
        Large_height:
          type: string
